description: Major progress by 2012 towards evidence-based, technically sound and inclusive development planning system.

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description:
Major objectives of the Project  is to support the Federal Government in its processes of development planning. This includes: 
1. Redesign and/or reinforcement, upon request, of the processes and institutions that can secure horizontal and vertical integration of planning such as institutional links between the Federal Ministry of Finance, National Planning Commission and the State planning commission, Line Ministries, Departments and Agencies,  and Local Government Authorities in the  the work of the Joint Planning Board (JPB).
2. Institutionalizing  key tools such as development and poverty assessments, a workable and inclusive macroeconomic model for Millenium Development Goal-based planning and sector needs assessments.
(d) Supporting a medium-term capacity development strategy and programme for the National and State Planning Commissions to enable them to perform their mandated role as the principal resource and coordination point on planning issues and economic adviser to Federal and State Governments.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Federal Development Planning

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description:
The project aims  support decentralized level development nd Millenium Develompent Goal-oriented planning in 13 States in Nigeria. The major outputs are: 
-Statistical Master plan developed and Statistical Bureau established, capacity gaps identified and statistical capacity development to enhance the planning process, budget preparation and implementation initiated 
-MDG based needs ssessment established and inform Medium Term Expenditure Framework and Medium Term Strategies.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: States Development Planning

subproject.corporate outcome: Inclusive growth and social equity promoted through pro-poor macroeconomic and fiscal policies that support income, employment and social protection of  youth, women and vulnerable groups in a sustainable way
subproject.description:
The project aims to support the Fiscal policy reform ie evidence based budgeting policies and procedures in 13 states in Nigeria. 
Major outputs include: 
1. Fiscal Responsibility Law operational (eg: Costed strategies, budget classifications, etc in place)
2. Advocacy and timely assistance to enable the drafting and, if requested, passage of fiscal responsibility legislation at State level as well as any follow-up action on capacity assessments and capacity development interventions to ensure timely implementation of such legislation.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: States Fiscal Policy Reform

subproject.corporate outcome: Inclusive growth and social equity promoted through pro-poor macroeconomic and fiscal policies that support income, employment and social protection of  youth, women and vulnerable groups in a sustainable way

subproject.description: (a) preparation of proposals on the aid architecture and management systems that best match the country conditions, including its Federal character, and policy priorities for development assistance; (b) design, installation (where relevant) and rollout of procedures and systems for aid coordination and management at Federal level (including regular publication of data and analysis)

subproject.corporate outcome: Inclusive growth and social equity promoted through pro-poor macroeconomic and fiscal policies that support income, employment and social protection of  youth, women and vulnerable groups in a sustainable way
subproject.description:
Support to aid coordination and management with the relevant Commissions in 13 target statesThis porject aims to support aid coordination in 13 states in Nigeria . Key strategies include: 

Piloting  of aid coordination frameworks and systems in selected States; and continued UNDP support to aid coordination based on advocacy, participation and, where appropriate, leadership in various donor country coordination groups.preparation of proposals on the aid architecture and management systems that best match the country conditions.The project is ongoing and is expected to end by 2013
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: States Aid Coordination
